header.header: There's a HIV epidemic in Estonia – make sure you're not infected
header.paragraph_2: Most new infected from Tallinn are from a normal family and make a decent living

header_2.text: You cannot rely on symptons to diagnose HIV. The only way to truly know if you have HIV or not is to get tested. Knowing your HIV status is important – if you know, you can make the right decisions concerning your health and avoid infecting others.

order_test.title: ORDER HOME TEST
order_test.description: Order a home test anonymously. It costs ca. 40€. See instructional video. The test takes about 20 minutes

visit_clinic.title: QUICK TEST IN A CLINIC
visit_clinic.description: You can take an anonymous test in a HIV consultation cente in Tallinn or Narva. The test takes about 3 minutes

get_tested.text: There are 14 locations across Estonia where you can get tested
get_tested.link: Find the one suitable for you

result.error: Oops! Something went terribly wrong, please try again
